doc.title: What Is Love?
doc.plot: This documentary film explores the meaning of Love from the perspective of people from all walks of life. With the backdrop of New York City streets, the site of the World Trade Center, and upstate New York, this exhibit provides the viewer with a refreshing study of everyday people speaking Truth. It is, in a sense, written by The World where homeless people, lovers, friends, children, Buddhist monks, and Baptist preachers all have their say.
